attributes.action: Annul the decision to take us into the EEC in 1973 as it was based on a lie
attributes.background: Many people who voted to take us into the EEC did so on the understanding that it was only ever meant to be a Trading Bloc & not one to become a United States of Europe.  I believe that as they were misled then the original decision of entry should be annulled forthwith.

rejection.details:
We're not sure what decision you're referring to. We think you might want the same action as this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/141961
